resources.string: This Book Is Overdue Please Return It
To checkout a book, you will have to click on a book on the home page or to view more books click on the more text on the right of every genre, then click on the book that you want.
When you have clicked the book that you want scroll to the bottom and click on the button that will meet your need.
Click on the Sign Out Button on the signout button and you will redirect you to the login page.
Click The 3 vertically aligned dots on the top right of the app.
Click on the button that fits your request (Reserved Books, Checked Out Books, Carted Books, or Overdue books.
Click on the 3 horizontal lines on the top left of the app.
Fill in the body section and click submit to email us.
Click on the Found An Error Message Us Button
Click on the top 3 vertically aligned buttons
Click on the 3 lines on the top left to open the side bar navigation.
Click on the 3 vertically aligned dots in the top right corner.
Click on the book to go to the book information page.
Click on the search icon and stat typing

Atlas is an application that can be used to access your school library within an instant virtually. It allows you browse through a vast collection of books quickly and efficiently. It allows you to checkout or reserve a book so that all you must do when you walk into your school library, is pick up the book you have checked out or reserved. Atlas will notify you when is book is ready to be picked up, if it\'s overdue, or when you are approaching the day of which the book is due for return. Atlas is compatible with many libraries, allowing students and teachers from different schools to view their own library. Our goal is to help manage the issuance of books and to provide other information at a school library. We will achieve this goal by: Allowing students and teachers to reserve books. Allowing students and teachers to check out books. Remind students and teachers when books are overdue. Show a map of the school library Please visit us on our social media at:
